Title: Sicario
Overview: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.
Tagline: The border is just another line to cross.
Keywords: mexico, cia, smoking, texas, fbi, murder, dirty cop, soccer, drug, fbi agent, night vision, death of daughter, tunnel, el paso, moral dilemma, death of wife, mexican cartel
production_companies: Lionsgate, Thunder Road Pictures, Black Label Media
Cast: Emily Blunt, Benicio del Toro, Josh Brolin
